text:
TODAY, on the day American deaths from COVID-19 passed the 100,000 threshold, Donald trump tweeted or retweeted dozens of times today about:
- Obama
- Twitter
- FISA
- himself

NOT ONE TWEET about the loss of American lives.

HE IS A DISGRACE.
